Description.Text: Go Native Aldgate East is a contemporary 4-star property offering stylish accommodation in the heart of London. Highlights include a fitness centre, free Wi-Fi and a good location near the Barbican Centre. The City is a bustling financial district notable for its distinctive high-rise buildings, upmarket boutiques and fashionable bars and restaurants. Nearby places of interest include St. Paul''s Cathedral, the Barbican Centre, Guildhall, Smithfield Market and the Bank of England. Aldgate East tube station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular London destinations. The hotel is housed in a traditional mid-rise building. Facilities include a fitness centre, and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Classic studios are decorated in a modern style with light tones. They feature a well-equipped kitchen. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, a fridge, a work desk and tea and coffee equipment. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower and a hairdryer. Every studio and apartment contains all the equipment needed to cook individual meals and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
